sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import Modal from "react-modal"; import "./ProductSection.css"; // Ensure styles are linked correctly const ProductSection = () => { const [modalData, setModalData] = useState(null); // ‚úÖ ALL 36 PRODUCTS WITH IMAGES INCLUDED const products = [ { id: 1, primaryImage: "/images/product/1.jpg", name: "Necklace", category: "Jewelry", oldPrice: "‚Çπ48,000", currentPrice: "‚Çπ44,015", description: "Elegant gold necklace with diamonds.", rating: 4.5 }, { id: 2, primaryImage: "/images/product/2.jpg", name: "Earrings", category: "Jewelry", oldPrice: "‚Çπ50,000", currentPrice: "‚Çπ45,015", description: "Beautiful earrings with intricate design.", rating: 4.2 }, { id: 3, primaryImage: "/images/product/3.jpg", name: "Earrings", category: "Jewelry", oldPrice: "‚Çπ50,500", currentPrice: "‚Çπ45,015", description: "Luxury earrings for special occasions.", rating: 4.3 }, { id: 4, primaryImage: "/images/product/4.jpg", name: "Earrings", category: "Jewelry", oldPrice: "‚Çπ51,000", currentPrice: "‚Çπ45,015", description: "Stylish earrings with gemstone.", rating: 4.4 }, { id: 5, primaryImage: "/images/product/5.jpg", name: "Bracelet", category: "Jewelry", oldPrice: "‚Çπ75,000", currentPrice: "‚Çπ74,015", description: "Classic gold bracelet.", rating: 4.6 }, { id: 6, primaryImage: "/images/product/6.jpg", name: "Bangles", category: "Jewelry", oldPrice: "‚Çπ65,000", currentPrice: "‚Çπ64,015", description: "Gold bangles with intricate craftsmanship.", rating: 4.7 }, { id: 7, primaryImage: "/images/product/7.jpg", name: "Bangles", category: "Jewelry", oldPrice: "‚Çπ65,500", currentPrice: "‚Çπ64,015", description: "Elegant bangles for festive occasions.", rating: 4.5 }, { id: 8, primaryImage: "/images/product/8.jpg", name: "Bangles", category: "Jewelry", oldPrice: "‚Çπ66,000", currentPrice: "‚Çπ64,015", description: "Traditional design with a modern touch.", rating: 4.8 }, { id: 9, primaryImage: "/images/product/9.jpg", name: "Ring", category: "Jewelry", oldPrice: "‚Çπ55,000", currentPrice: "‚Çπ54,015", description: "Elegant diamond ring for engagements.", rating: 4.8 }, { id: 10, primaryImage: "/images/product/10.jpg", name: "Diamond Necklace", category: "Jewelry", oldPrice: "‚Çπ96,000", currentPrice: "‚Çπ94,015", description: "Exquisite diamond necklace.", rating: 4.9 }, ]; const openModal = (product) => setModalData(product); const closeModal = () => setModalData(null); return (

Bestselling Products

{products.map((product) => (
{product.category}

{product.name}

{Array.from({ length: 5 }).map((_, index) => ( ))}

{product.description}

{product.oldPrice} {product.currentPrice}
))}
{/* Modal for Quick View */} {modalData && (

{modalData.name}

{modalData.description}

{modalData.oldPrice} {modalData.currentPrice}
{Array.from({ length: 5 }).map((_, index) => ( ))}
)}
); }; export default ProductSection;
